info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:35AM CDT until July 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BEAVER...SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS...LIPSCOMB...HANSFORD AND OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1235 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Follett to 6 miles east of Gruver, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Spearman, Lipscomb, Booker, Gruver, Follett, Higgins, Darrouzett, Wolf Creek Park, Farnsworth and Waka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
